control

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.UserController

  • public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserController class acts provides methods for the UserView class to allow it pass on requests from the user.

      • requestPublication

        public void requestPublication(Publication publication,
                               java.lang.String userName,
                               java.lang.String userEmail,
                               java.lang.String message)
        Sends the publication request as an email to the respective author.
        Parameters:
        publication - Publication being requested.
        userName - Name of user making request.
        userEmail - Email of user making request.
        message - Message to author from user.

      • requestSupport

                           java.lang.String userEmail,

        Parameters:
        userName - Name of user making request.
        userEmail - Email of user making request.
        message - Message to system administrator from user.

        Returns:
